page.title: 08Local People
page.content:
{ Mr.Parr}is a County Councillor. He is on the Public Protection Committee and the Fire Service Committee. One of his concerns is the number of stray dogs which kill farm animals. { Miss M.B.M.(Peggy) Jackson}told us stories of Ashover Light Railway which used to run from Clay Cross. She was a councillor and until her eightieth birthday she was Chairman of the Governors of Stretton Handley School. She is the Clay Cross Division President of the Girl Guides. { Mr.R.Beaver}is a N.E.Derbyshire Councillor.He says that his main concern is the environment and that firms should burn their toxic waste instead of dumping it around villages.
There is a{tramp}who lives in an old railway workers' hut. He sets snares for rabbits and makes nettle soup.
